select * from song s left join chart c on c.sid = s.sid
and s.s_mode = (s.s_mode | (#{mode} >> 1) and c.level between lvge and lvle and c.promote = #{promote}
mapper.insert: insert into song (sid, length, bpm, title, artist, s_mode, time, s_md5, s_file_path, img_md5, img_file_path) values (#{sid}, #{length}, #{bpm}, #{title}, #{artist}, #{s_mode}, #{time}, #{s_md5}, #{s_file_path}, #{img_md5}, #{img_file_path}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE length = values(length), bpm = values(bpm), title = values(title), artist = values(artist), s_mode = values(s_mode), time = values(time), s_md5 = values(s_md5), s_file_path = values(s_file_path), img_md5 = values(img_md5), img_file_path = values(img_file_path)
